categories: Category:Members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi

nodes.text: Marinda Gan was a female Twi'lek bounty hunter who was a member of the Spice Runners of Kijimi. Along with several other smugglers of the Spice Runners, Gan was left stuck on the moon Yavin 4 following the death of their pilot. Marinda Gan was a hardened warrior who was not known for her patience. During her time with the Spice Runners, she wielded a Twi'lek lyaer'tsa, a traditional weapon of her people.
